mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.perms FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.menu_type = 'F' AND m.status = true AND m.deleted = false

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.perms, m.icon, m.order_num FROM sys_menu m
INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id AND rm.deleted = false INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id AND ur.deleted = false
WHERE m.menu_type != 'F' AND m.status = true AND m.visible = true AND m.deleted = false
AND ur.user_id = #{userId}
ORDER BY m.order_num

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.menu_type FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id AND rm.deleted = false WHERE rm.role_id = #{roleId} AND m.status = true AND m.visible = true AND m.deleted = false
